thread.title: West Brom 1 Sunderland 0 - LIVE

title: West Brom 1 Sunderland 0 - LIVE
text: This live stream has now ended. Updates appear in chronological order. 14:55 — West Bromwich Albion (@WBAFCofficial) October 17, 2015 14:56 — Matt Wilson (@mattwilson_star) October 17, 2015 14:58 The teams are out here, with a late change for #afcb as Federici starts in place of Boruc. #MCIBOU — AFC Bournemouth (@afcbournemouth) October 17, 2015 14:58 Sessegnon's name received quite a loud cheer from the Albion fans when it was read out. #wba — Matt Wilson (@mattwilson_star) October 17, 2015 15:09 A big welcome back to former Albion defender Billy Jones, who lines up at left-back for Sunderland this afternoon #WBA — West Bromwich Albion (@WBAFCofficial) October 17, 2015 15:09 A fitting tribute to Howard Kendall as fans from both sides take part in a minute's applause for the Everton legend. #mufc — Manchester United (@ManUtd) October 17, 2015 15:09 — Matt Wilson (@mattwilson_star) October 17, 2015 15:09 — West Bromwich Albion (@WBAFCofficial) October 17, 2015 15:09 — Premier League (@premierleague) October 17, 2015 15:09 — Matt Wilson (@mattwilson_star) October 17, 2015 Tap to see all updates in full screen. Close fullscreen
